h2_title: Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide
content: However, when he brings his duplicates back together, he will be surrounded by swirling spears. This is when the attacks start to get far more dangerous. You'll see pulses of red flashing as well as lightning as the spears spin faster and faster. The projectiles can be reflected, but it's the end of this attack that causes the greatest damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Erlang,_The_Sacred_Divinity.md', within the main section titled 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
However, when he brings his duplicates back together, he will be surrounded by swirling spears. This is when the attacks start to get far more dangerous. You'll see pulses of red flashing as well as lightning as the spears spin faster and faster. The projectiles can be reflected, but it's the end of this attack that causes the greatest damage.
